scripts.transpile: yarn transpile:moment && yarn transpile:options && yarn transpile:background
scripts.build: yarn build:base && yarn build:firefox && yarn build:edge
scripts.package: yarn build && yarn package:firefox && yarn package:edge
scripts.test: yarn build:manifest firefox && concurrently "yarn copy --watch" "yarn build:base --watch" "yarn build:files:firefox --watch" "yarn transpile:moment -w" "yarn transpile:options -w" "yarn transpile:background -w" "yarn web-ext:run" --kill-others
scripts.test:fr: concurrently "yarn copy --watch" "yarn transpile:moment -w" "yarn transpile:options -w" "yarn transpile:background -w" "yarn web-ext:run --pref intl.accept_languages=fr-fr" --kill-others
scripts.test:cs: concurrently "yarn copy --watch" "yarn transpile:moment -w" "yarn transpile:options -w" "yarn transpile:background -w" "yarn web-ext:run --pref intl.accept_languages=cs" --kill-others
